H0.text: Heat energy is the form in which most of the energy released from gasoline when burned by an automobile.

H1.text: Nuclear energy is the form in which most of the energy is released from gasoline when it is burned by an automobile.

H2.text: Solar energy is the form in which most of the energy released from gasoline when burned by an automobile is released.

H3.text: Sound energy is the form in which most of the energy released from gasoline when burned by an automobile is released.

A4.text: Internal combustion engines are considered heat engines (since the release of chemical energy in combustion has the same effect as heat transfer into the engine)
